A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Never would I have expected someone to make an experimental Star Wars film. It was a bold risk\, but it definitely paid off. Not everyone will like it\, but that's okay because this movie is what the Star Wars franchise needed. The Force Awakens played it safe and nostalgic to draw longtime fans back in with it's familiarity\, while The Last Jedi totally sets it's own tone and makes the franchise new and exciting again. This is definitely my new favourite Star Wars film
